name: Grand Anse Waterfall: The Key of Silence
description: Grand Anse waterfall drowns all thought; eight candles gutter in the spray while three lie drowned in wax puddles, and one rusted iron key rests on a stone tongue scored with four etched tallies. Kassim wades waist-deep to seize the key as Naia signals bearings with soaked parchment and Maliya presses a blessing of river mud to his forehead, muttering that the revenant fears what cannot breathe.
riddle: Count the flames that survive, honor the drowned, and heed the tallies—only silence unlocks the roaring gate.
